start.welcome: 👋 Welcome to Claude Code Telegram Bot, {name}!
start.description: 🤖 I help you access Claude Code remotely through Telegram.
start.quick_start_2: Use `/cd <project>` to navigate to a project
start.quick_start_3: Send any message to start coding with Claude!
start.security_note: 🔒 Your access is secured and all actions are logged.
start.usage_note: 📊 Use `/status` to check your usage limits.

help.title: 🤖 **Claude Code Telegram Bot Help**
help.usage_file: Send a file to have Claude review it
help.file_ops_send: Send text files (.py, .js, .md, etc.) for review
help.file_ops_modify: Claude can read, modify, and create files
help.file_ops_security: All file operations are within your approved directory
help.tips_specific: Use specific, clear requests for best results
help.tips_buttons: Use quick action buttons when available

messages.language_select:
🌐 **Language Selection**

Please choose your preferred language:
messages.claude_unavailable:
❌ **Claude Integration Not Available**

The Claude Code integration is not properly configured. Please contact the administrator.
messages.action_failed:
❌ **Action Failed**

Failed to execute {action}. Please try again.
messages.what_next: 💡 **What would you like to do next?**

errors.quick_actions_unavailable:
❌ **Quick Actions Not Available**

Quick actions feature is not available.
errors.claude_not_available:
❌ **Claude Integration Not Available**

Claude integration is not properly configured.
errors.action_not_found:
❌ **Action Not Found**

Quick action '{action}' is not available.
errors.action_not_implemented:
⚠️ **Action Not Implemented**

This action is not fully implemented yet. Please try another action.
errors.action_error:
❌ **Action Error**

An error occurred while executing {action}: {error}

quick_actions.title:
🛠️ **Quick Actions**

Choose a common development task:
quick_actions.no_actions: No quick actions available for this context.

error_messages.session_not_found:
🔄 **Session Not Found**

The Claude session could not be found or has expired.

**What you can do:**
• Use `/new` to start a fresh session
• Try your request again
• Use `/status` to check your current session
error_messages.rate_limit_reached:
⏱️ **Rate Limit Reached**

Too many requests in a short time period.

**What you can do:**
• Wait a moment before trying again
• Use simpler requests
• Check your current usage with `/status`
error_messages.request_timeout:
⏰ **Request Timeout**

Your request took too long to process and timed out.

**What you can do:**
• Try breaking down your request into smaller parts
• Use simpler commands
• Try again in a moment
error_messages.claude_integration_not_available:
❌ **Claude integration not available**

The Claude Code integration is not properly configured. Please contact the administrator.
error_messages.file_too_large:
❌ **File Too Large**

Maximum file size: {max_size}MB
Your file: {file_size}MB
error_messages.file_format_not_supported:
❌ **File Format Not Supported**

File must be text-based and UTF-8 encoded.

**Supported formats:**
• Source code files (.py, .js, .ts, etc.)
• Text files (.txt, .md)
• Configuration files (.json, .yaml, .toml)
• Documentation files
error_messages.send_response_failed: ❌ Failed to send response. Please try again.

callback_errors.bot_updated: The bot may have been updated since this message was sent.
callback_errors.try_again_text_commands: Please try again or use text commands.
callback_errors.general_error: An error occurred while processing your request.
callback_errors.action_not_implemented: This action is not implemented yet.
callback_errors.claude_integration_error: Claude integration is not properly configured.
callback_errors.no_session_try_new: Try starting a new session instead.
callback_errors.create_directories: Create some directories to organize your projects!
callback_errors.unknown_action:
❌ **Unknown Action**

This button action is not recognized. The bot may have been updated since this message was sent.
callback_errors.processing_error:
❌ **Error Processing Action**

An error occurred while processing your request.
Please try again or use text commands.
callback_errors.directory_not_found:
❌ **Directory Not Found**

The directory `{project_name}` no longer exists or is not accessible.
callback_errors.directory_changed:
✅ **Directory Changed**

📂 Current directory: `{relative_path}/`

🔄 Claude session cleared. You can now start coding in this directory!

system_errors.auth_required: 🔒 Authentication required. Please contact the administrator.
system_errors.security_violation: 🛡️ Security violation detected. This incident has been logged.
system_errors.rate_limit_exceeded: ⏱️ Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before sending more messages.
system_errors.configuration_error: ⚙️ Configuration error. Please contact the administrator.
system_errors.operation_timeout: ⏰ Operation timed out. Please try again with a simpler request.
